default.ORG: organization entities are limited to named corporate, governmental, or other organizational entities.
default.PER: person entities are named persons or family.
default.LOC: location entities are the name of politically or geographically defined locations such as cities, provinces, countries, international regions, bodies of water, mountains, etc.
default.MISC: miscellaneous entities, e.g. events, nationalities, products or works of art.
